com.salimov.yurii.dao.interfaces

Interface ContentDao<T extends Content<E>,E extends java.lang.Number>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Entity type, extends Content.
    E - Entity id type, extends Number.
    All Superinterfaces:
    DataDao<T,E>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArticleDao, CategoryDao, CompanyDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArticleDaoImpl, CategoryDaoImpl, CompanyDaoImpl

    public interface ContentDao<T extends Content<E>,E extends java.lang.Number>
extends DataDao<T,E>
    The interface provides a set of standard methods for working objects of the Content class or subclasses with a database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    DataDao, Content

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getByTitle(java.lang.String title)
      Returns content object of the Content class or subclasses with the parameter title from a database.
      T getByUrl(java.lang.String url)
      Returns content object of the Content class or subclasses with the parameter url from a database.
      void removeByTitle(java.lang.String title)
      Removes content object of the Content class or subclasses with the parameter title from a database.
      void removeByUrl(java.lang.String url)
      Removes content object with the parameter url from a database.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.salimov.yurii.dao.interfaces.DataDao

        add, addAll, exists, get, getAll, remove, remove, remove, removeAll, update
